name: City Ambulance Driving Game 2017: Emergency Racing
name_original: City Ambulance Driving Game 2017: Emergency Racing
description:
Do you want to be ambulance driver?
Do you have the courage to become 911 Emergency Rescue Ambulance driver on big city roads & off-road curvy mountains? If yes! Then this ambulance heli rescue is the right ambulance simulator for you. Where there might be a fatal accident, where you have to rescue the patients and injured as an ambulance driver. Make them feel comfortable in the stretcher as a paramedic, Provide them the necessary first aid and off to the hospital emergency, drop off the injured patients there. it’s time to race to save the world! Turn on Siren with this ambulance parking simulator, learn how to drive under the pressure of time and in a state of emergency in one of the best 2017 ambulance simulator.
City Ambulance Rescue Duty is a great game for all those people who want to help of humans. City Ambulance Rescue Duty game has beautiful environment. You will feel like you are driving ambulance in your real life. Always be alert when you are on duty because an accident can happen anytime and anywhere so be an active ambulance driver.
Turn on ambulance sirens and push the throttle to race fast. Hurdles and heavy traffic like cars, buses, and other traffic vehicles on your way so drive carefully. Drive one the best ambulance rescue driving game of 2017.Ambulance city Driver 2017-Duty simulator full of actions that you need to take on emergency calls for taking patients from emergency spot to hospital in minimum time. Ambulance driver job on mega city roads is dangerous so be careful!
There has been Emergency in town a massive accident occurred and you’re on-duty 911 ambulance rescue. You need to get in your ambulance and drive the doctor to the injured ones as fast as you can to save patients lives. Start your 911 ambulance, fasten your seat belts and become a city traffic racer to transfer patients. Race your car calls 1122 through the big city traffic, let doctor rescue injured in accidents and drive them safely to the hospital. Life in the town is crazy, watch out for the people and the traffic. Play 911 Emergency Rescue Driver 2017 Simulator which is the latest and most anticipated 1122 rescuer game.
In this Ambulance Duty Driver 2017-Rescue simulator game you have been given the role of a skilled ambulance driver, learn how to drive an ambulance truck, and park it in front of a big city parking 3D hospital. Help the doctors by giving them the patients in time. Drive your vehicle in the big city to the hospital and show your skills of precision driving and parking game of 2017.
Download it now this ambulance game and help the people by saving their lives.



Features:
• Different Ambulances with detailed interiors
• Lots of Challenging Rescue Missions
• RESCUE people and save lives by taking them to the hospital!
• Simple and easy controls for seamless driving experience
• Explore the beautiful open world
• Realistic Ambulance driving physics
• Smooth controls and fun gameplay
• Realistic intelligent traffic
• Drive the patients to the hospital
• Experience the smooth gameplay of this free driving simulator game
• Best Parking game

We hope you enjoy playing Ambulance Simulator game 2017. Your comments, feedbacks are value able for us.
